dcterms:creator: Adel Ahmadyan
Liangkai Zhang
Jianing Wei
Artsiom Ablavatski
Matthias Grundmann
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 14,819 videos annotated with 3D bounding boxes over unique objects. These objects are split into nine different categories and filmed using mobile phones in an object-centric fashion. The dataset is primarily meant for 3D object detection and localization tasks.
dcterms:title: Objectron

dcterms:creator: Khurram Soomro
Amir Roshan Zamir
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 13,320 videos annotated with 101 action labels. It proposes a large diversity in terms of video content, recording settings, and action recognition challenges, focusing on human activities.
dcterms:title: UCF101
